```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

### Install and load the required libraries

```{r Load required libraries, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(repr)
library(viridis)
library(lubridate)
library(zoo)
library(kableExtra)
```

### Check the working directory

```{r Get working directory}
getwd()

```
### Read dataset
```{r}
plot1_df <- read_tsv("Lab1_scatterplot_set_1.txt",show_col_types = FALSE)

 
kbl(plot1_df[1:10,1:3]) %>%
  kable_paper(fixed_thead = T) %>%
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = "striped", position = "left", full_width = F)

```
